function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in data sharing formats and standards","Impact":"Difficulty in sharing and using core medical data","Mitigation":"Adoption of standardized data sharing formats and interoperable software","Technologies":"Data integration platforms and interoperable software solutions","People":"Medical researchers, healthcare providers, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Lack of clarity in sharing observational data","Impact":"Uncertain framework for sharing EHR data","Mitigation":"Development of clear guidelines for sharing observational data","Technologies":"Health data management systems and interoperable data sharing platforms","People":"Healthcare providers, researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, healthcare organizations, and research institutions"},{"Description":"Difficulty in sharing individual patient-level data","Impact":"Limited detailed data for research and analysis","Mitigation":"Secure data sharing protocols and patient privacy protection measures","Technologies":"Secure data sharing platforms and privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"Healthcare providers, medical researchers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions, and regulatory bodies"}]}
